description: Despite numerous reports claiming both Liverpool and Bayer Leverkusen want quick resolution of the transfer of Florian Wirtz from the BayArena to Anfield, the negotiations between the two clubs are still ongoing. Journalist David Ornstein has provided a fresh update on the situation. html:
Despite numerous reports claiming both Liverpool and Bayer Leverkusen want quick resolution of the transfer of Florian Wirtz from the BayArena to Anfield, the negotiations between the two clubs are still ongoing.

Journalist David Ornstein has provided a fresh update on the situation.

Where do things stand on Florian Wirtz to Liverpool?@David_Ornstein offers an update üó£Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/IkOYfFNGtZ
